label: 安堵
本: State of War: the Violent Order of Fourteenth Century Japan . Michigan University Press . 2003
説明文: Confirmation of lands, their transmission, or sale, by someone in higher authority. Unitary (ichien) confirmations were the most desired, and could be conveyed through edicts (see kudashibumi) or through merely notations scrawled on the reverse of documents (uragaki ando). [一円、下文、裏書安堵]
